sentence.Network_en: A doodlebug curls in his effort to get there.
sentence.Network_cn: 一只狮蚁的幼虫蜷曲着努力爬行.

sentence.Network_en: This made him look like a doodlebug, so I began calling him'Doodle.
sentence.Network_cn: 这使他看上去像一只幼虫, 所以我开始叫他 “ 嘟嘟”.

PerfectNetExp.abs: doodlebug的用法例句 1. A doodlebug curls in his effort to get there. 努力地,狮蚁屈伸而达。 2. This made him look like a doodlebug, so I began.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent. (in sense 1): from 17th-cent. doodle 'ninny' + bug

means.word_mean: 2. a small jet-propelled winged missile that carries a bomb
3. the larva of an ant lion or of any of several other insects
